summary: Utility module for preparing speech data for the NeMo forced aligner. It offers functions to extract utterance identifiers, augment utterance objects with start/end timestamps, retrieve batch-specific start/end indices and variables, handle character tokenization, and generate manifest lines for batches of audio-transcript pairs. The helpers streamline the creation of NeMo-compatible manifests and token case restoration for downstream forced‑alignment processing.
business_intent: Enable automated preprocessing of audio and transcription datasets into the format required by the NeMo forced alignment pipeline, facilitating large‑scale speech alignment tasks.
